attributes.action: Allow Chester Zoo to reopen, safely and with social distancing.
attributes.additional_details: If it remains closed we run the risk of it closing forever.  The loss of the zoo to worldwide conversation is incalculable.  Losing it is unthinkable. People are crowding onto beaches and into parks yet somewhere as big as the zoo that has the space to distance people remains closed.
attributes.background: Chester Zoo needs visitors to survive.    There is no reason why the zoo cannot open with social distancing in place.  Please allow it to reopen.

rejection.details:
